turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Google, I am craving pizza from Ziggy's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from the East side location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to place your order now or at a later time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to start with 6 BBQ wings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like a dipping sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Ranch dressing.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would also like one white delight pizza and a BBQ chicken pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size pizza do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like for both to be on the regular 9x13" crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any dessert?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to add anything else to the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the chicken wings and two pizzas are all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to pick up the order or have it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will pick up the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Your order is a 6 piece order of BBQ chicken wings with ranch sauce, a white delight pizza and BBQ chicken pizza. Does this look correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes this is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order will be charged to the card on your account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else that I can help you with today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that it everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Goodbye.
